about_the_game: In the zany DLC 01 "Scapegoath Science" for Gloaming Comedian Simulator, Barry Sazou finds himself in a madcap adventure with the Mad Scientist. This chapter shows Barry juggling a gag-filled gadget in a ludicrous lab experiment. With a blend of slapstick scenarios and wacky wordplay, Barry must outsmart the quirky, yet brilliant scientist using his sharpest tool: a well-timed joke. Expect a whirlwind of puns and hilarious happenings in this laugh-out-loud addition to Barry's comedic escapades in Transylvania.
